Categories.Name: Positive Attitude
Categories.Description: People enjoy being around someone who believes it them and in the goodness of life.

Challenges.Name: Reach out and pump up
Challenges.Instructions: Take a minute to go out of your way to express confidence in someone.  This can be an electronic communication, but in person is best.
Examples: I'm glad you are in charge of that project.  I think your are the right person to get it done.
I'm looking forward to tasting those cookies you are baking.  They smell delicious!
That party you planned is on my mind.  See you there!

Categories.Name: Engaged and Passionate
Categories.Description: It feels great to know someone is putting there best into something, especially when collaborating.

Challenges.Name: Three Ideas
Challenges.Instructions: For one of your current collaborations, think of 2-3 things you would enjoy doing to help.

Categories.Name: Laugh at Yourself
Categories.Description: It's comfortable and inviting to be around someone who can laugh at themselves.

Challenges.Name: Post Something Mildy Embarrassing
Challenges.Instructions: Very few people will enjoy seeing your vacation photos online... unless it's of you falling off the boat.
